<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 432, 719, 448]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 448, 325, 463]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 463, 504, 479]]<|/det|>
You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 479, 504, 494]]<|/det|>
Do not use staples, paper clips, glue or correction fluid.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 494, 384, 509]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 525, 255, 540]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 540, 653, 556]]<|/det|>
If working is needed for any question it must be shown below that question.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 556, 384, 571]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 571, 905, 602]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 602, 447, 617]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 632, 604, 648]]<|/det|>
